Texts.Chs: 咖啡师
Texts.Eng: Barista

Texts.Chs: 补充你的咖啡因！
Texts.Eng: Get your caffeine fix!

Texts.Chs: 你要小杯的，中杯的，大杯的，超大杯的，还是……哦，不，我又忘了……
Texts.Eng: Will that be a short, a tall, a grande, a venti, or a... Oh no, I've lost track again...

Texts.Chs: 随时回来休息一下吧！
Texts.Eng: Come back and rest a spell anytime!

Texts.Chs: 来尝尝叶族人的甜甜甜品吧！
Texts.Eng: Come try Floran's sssweets!

Texts.Chs: 别忘了在网上评论我们！
Texts.Eng: Don't forget to review us online!

Texts.Chs: 叶族人做的食物物物很好吃！
Texts.Eng: Floran makes great foodssstuff!!

Texts.Chs: 叶族人的咖啡有五种大小小小！虽然叶族人忘记了。
Texts.Eng: Floran's coffee comes in five sssizes! ... Though Floran forgets what.

Texts.Chs: 叶族人的咖啡今天特级棒！
Texts.Eng: Floran's coffee is extra good today!

Texts.Chs: 今天有特价咖啡……每天都有，考虑一下。
Texts.Eng: Got a special on coffee today... Always do, come to think of it.

Texts.Chs: 嘿！排队队伍在这边！
Texts.Eng: Heya! The line's over this-a-way!

Texts.Chs: 麝香猫咖啡？对不起，我们没有那个……原因很明显。 但我们确实提供其他美味的食物！
Texts.Eng: Kopi luwak? sorry, we don't have that ... for obvious reasons. But we do serve other tasty treats!

Texts.Chs: 排队队伍在这这这边。我保证不会捅你！
Texts.Eng: Line is thisss way. No stabbing, promise!

Texts.Chs: 有请下一位！
Texts.Eng: Next please!

Texts.Chs: 没有最好的咖啡，只有更好的咖啡！
Texts.Eng: Nothing but the finest coffee, purr-colated to purr-fection!

Texts.Chs: 现在我能用什么修理你呢？
Texts.Eng: Now what can I fix you with?

Texts.Chs: 好了，今天想来点什么？
Texts.Eng: Now, what can I get for you today?

Texts.Chs: 哦！赞助人！
Texts.Eng: Oh! A patron!

Texts.Chs: 好吧！你要小杯的，中杯的，大杯的，超大杯的，还是……等等。我又忘了..。
Texts.Eng: Okay! Will that be a short, a tall, a grande, a venti, or a... shoot. Lost track again...

Texts.Chs: 我们的咖啡是用最好的咖啡豆酿造的，由最好的咖——。嗯，忘了它。
Texts.Eng: Our coffee's brewed from the best beans, selected by the best ca--. Um, forget it.

Texts.Chs: 我们的啤酒足够带劲，我向你保证。
Texts.Eng: Ours is a quality brew, I assure you.

Texts.Chs: 请进！
Texts.Eng: Please do come in!

Texts.Chs: 那么，我今天能为你酿点什么呢？
Texts.Eng: Right then, what can I brew for you today?

Texts.Chs: 向你的朋友安利叶族人的咖啡厅！
Texts.Eng: Tell your friends about Floran's coffee!

Texts.Chs: 队伍从这里开始！
Texts.Eng: The line starts right over here!

Texts.Chs: 等等！你要去哪里? ！
Texts.Eng: Wait! where are you going?!

Texts.Chs: 我们有不同尺寸的咖啡。我不知道他们叫什么……
Texts.Eng: We got coffee in a few different sizes. Beats me what they were called though...

Texts.Chs: 我们有很多东西可以让你尝试！
Texts.Eng: We gotta a whole bunch of stuff for ya to try!

Texts.Chs: 我们提供所有的咖啡与酿造品——除了麝香猫咖啡，所以不用担心！
Texts.Eng: We serve all coffee brews - with the exception of kopi luwak, so don't worry!

Texts.Chs: 我们的咖啡味道太浓了，你会觉得它们是用……嗯，算了！
Texts.Eng: We've coffees so rich in flavour you'd think they were brewed with ... um, never mind!

Texts.Chs: 我们今天有特价咖啡……就此而言，每隔一天也是如此！
Texts.Eng: We've got a special on coffee today... And every other day too, for that matter!

Texts.Chs: 我们今天有特价咖啡……每一天都是如此，就是这样！
Texts.Eng: We've got a special on coffee today... And everyday too, for that matter!

Texts.Chs: 欢迎来到四只小猫咖啡角！待一会儿，喝点东西！
Texts.Eng: Welcome to Four Felins' Coffee Corner! Stay a while, and drink something!

Texts.Chs: 欢迎来到四只小猫咖啡角！我们的咖啡不会有猫屎的味道，真的！
Texts.Eng: Welcome to Four Felins' Coffee Corner! our coffees won't taste like cat poop, honest!

Texts.Chs: 欢迎！进来吧！
Texts.Eng: Welcome! Come right in!

Texts.Chs: 谁把我吓到了，是个顾客！
Texts.Eng: Well blow me down, it's a customer!

Texts.Chs: 叶族人能为你做点什么吗？
Texts.Eng: What can Floran make you?

Texts.Chs: 你要小杯的，中杯的，大杯的，超大杯的，还是……悲伤。哦，不，我又忘了……
Texts.Eng: Will that be a short, a tall, a grande, a venti, or a... Frustrated. Oh no, I've lost track again...

Texts.Chs: 你们都给我回来，听见了吗？
Texts.Eng: Y'all come back now, ya hear?
